title: Steak Salad
ingredients: 8 cups romaine lettuce - rinsed, dried, and torn into bite-size pieces
¼ cup sliced pimento-stuffed green olives
method: Step 1: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.

Step 2: Place steak on preheated grill and cook for 3 to 5 minutes per side or until desired doneness. Remove from heat and let sit until cool enough to handle. Slice steak into strips or bite-sized pieces.
Step 3: Whisk olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; stir in blue cheese. Cover and refrigerate.
Step 4: Arrange lettuce, tomato, pepper, carrot, onion, and olives onto chilled plates. Top with steak and drizzle with dressing.
